name: Gallant (Mango Mob)
description:
A souls-like boss rush experience, where the main focus of the game is defeating the demons of the abyss. The player will face powerful bosses using the power of adrenaline gained by perfectly timing dodges to empower their attacks and defeat the boss.

Controls:

       Included with executable ("Gallant - Controls.txt")

Programmers:

  • Michael Jordan (https://itch.io/profile/corrosiveknifer)
  • William De Beer

  • Peter Nguyen
  • Roger Painting (https://magicmanprime.itch.io/)
  • Sabrina Li
  • William Lawrence (https://williaml.itch.io/)
